old:
い、異国の覚者様――？
な、何か、ご用でしょうか
column2: A, Arisen from a foreign land――? Umm, do you need something?

old:
もう、逃げるのも疲れてしまいました
少し座って休みたい――
column2:
I'm tired of running away
I need to sit down and rest a bit--

old: 私がいた村は侵食に飲み込まれて――
column2: The village I was in has been corrupted...

old: 今を耐え抜けば、幸せになれるのかしら――
column2: If I endure this moment, will I be able to become happy?
